name: Coinbread
description: Coinbread lets you collect your slice of $BTC and turns passive holding into active on-chain ownership. By pairing the loaf with cbBTC rewards on Base, every trade drips real Bitcoin directly to your wallet. No staking hoops, no hidden team bags, just soft-crust fun with hard-money upside. Add deep launch liquidity, a treasury secured by multi-sig, and zero team tokens, and you get a protocol built to rise, feed its community over time, and showcase how open finance should taste.
